definition: variant of 漱[shu4]
to rinse one's mouth with water/to gargle
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to suck/to drink
to wash the face and rinse the mouth
to rinse one's mouth/to gargle
Liang Shuming (1893-1988), modern philosopher and teacher in the neo-Confucian tradition
Natsume Sōseki (1867-1916), one of the first modern Japanese novelists
see 枕石漱流[zhen3 shi2 shu4 liu2]
to live a hermit's life (in seclusion)/a frugal life (idiom)
to rinse the mouth and wash the face
to rinse one's mouth with water/to gargle

sentences.english: Then, rinses the saliva including the approximately 10 milliliters , rinses 1 minute with the above method.
sentences.chinese: 然后，含约10毫升的漱口水，用上述方法漱1分钟。

sentences.english: Who is jade-raising spring related to ?
Please wash your mouth and spit out the water into the spittoon.
sentences.chinese: 已经注射好了，请漱漱口，吐到痰盂中。

sentences.english: Now you've gotten the injection. Please wash your mouth and spit out the water into the  spittoon.
sentences.chinese: 已经注射好了，请漱漱口，吐到痰盂中。

sentences.english: Pablo made a swishing noise rinsing wine in his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃罗用酒漱着口，发出咕噜噜噜的声音。

sentences.english: My throat huts . Id better gargle.
Now you've gotten the injection. Please wash your mouth and spit out the water into the spittoon.

sentences.english: Some drink from the fountain of knowledge, but he just gargled. 7.
sentences.chinese: 人家畅饮智慧之泉，他只是拿来漱了漱口。

sentences.english: Rinse your mouth and spit into the basin.
sentences.chinese: 请漱一下口，吐到盆子里。

sentences.english: Some drink from the fountain of knowledge, but he just gargled.
sentences.chinese: 人家畅饮智慧之泉，他只是拿来漱了漱口。

sentences.english: I rinsed out my mouth with water and then looked in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 我用清水漱了漱口，然后照照镜子。

sentences.english: You give me a drop oft ears, I saw your heart all the oceans.
sentences.chinese: 漱翛你给我的一滴泪，我看见你心中所有的海洋。

sentences.english: After brushing their teeth in the morning, some people rinse with mouthwash.
sentences.chinese: 有些人早上刷完牙后，会用漱口水再漱漱口。
